title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.5 - Requests for records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.5 - Requests for records

State Regulations

All requests shall be made in writing and reasonably describe
the record or records sought. The authority shall respond in writing within
five business days or acknowledge receipt with written notice of when request
will be granted or denied within 30 days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9001.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
